attributes.action: Stop producing fireworks In the name of the environment
attributes.additional_details: The sale , use, production and import of fireworks allow the environment to suffer damage and causes terror among people. First and foremost the environment should be a priority
attributes.background: Stop the import , production, sale and use of fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738
